lead_paragraph: Hyundai Motor Co and affiliate Kia Motors said on Monday they aim to increase their combined sales to 8.25 million vehicles globally in 2017, despite rising competition.
snippet: Hyundai Motor Co and affiliate Kia Motors said on Monday they aim to increase their combined sales to 8.25 million vehicles globally in 2017, despite rising competition....

headline.main: Hyundai, Kia Aim to Grow 2017 Sales to 8.25 Mln Vehicles Globally
headline.print_headline: Hyundai, Kia Aim to Grow 2017 Sales to 8.25 Mln Vehicles Globally
